mutants.code:
def reverse_slice(lst, index):
    start_index = 1
    end_index = index
    while start_index < end_index:
        temp = lst[start_index]
        lst[start_index] = lst[end_index]
        lst[end_index] = temp
        start_index += 1
        end_index -= 1
    return lst[:index + 1]

def reverse_slice(lst, index):
    start_index = -1
    end_index = index

        temp = lst[start_index]

        lst[end_index] = temp
        start_index += 1

    return lst[:index + 1]
